Label: borehole logging
Description: Geophysical measurement along the axis of a borehole carried out with a special logging device.

Label: multi-electrode dc profile
Description: DC resistivity and/or chargability (IP) measurement carried out along a profile with a larger set of electrodes. Also known as 2D resistivity tomography.

Label: seismic line
Description: Geophysical measurement used to record acoustic response of seismic sources along a line in order to define seismic properties in a cross section of the earth.

Label: flight line
Description: Geophysical measurement carried out from a flying platform along a line

Label: cone penetration test
Description: Geotechnical and geophysical measurement carried out by pushing down an instrumented cone into the ground. Also known as CPT.

Label: vertical seismic profile
Description: Geophysical measurement used to record acoustic response of waves travelling between a borehole and the surface. Also known as VSP.

Label: georadar profile
Description: Geophysical measurement used to record electromagnetic response from a radar source along a profile in order to define EM properties in a cross section of the earth.
